Daniel Sosah (bu onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 21 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu Belarusian Isloch Minsk Raion bọọlụ. A mụrụ ya na Ghana, ọ na-anọchite anya ndị otu mba Niger.

A mụrụ Sosah na Ghana site na nna Beninois na nne Ghana, wee malite ọrụ ya na Niger ebe ọ bụ nwa amaala. Ọ malitere maka ndị otu mba Niger na 5–1 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification loss to Algeria na 8 Ọktoba 2021, ebe o nyere naanị goolu nke otu ya.
